channel.title: Blog on Quiqr
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Quiqr

item.title: Quiqr Next Generation
item.description: After some explorations and with the arrival of @bert-janzwanepol as new core member, we have now really started to catch up on an enormous backlog.

item.title: Shiny New Gallery Template
item.description: We have published a new free and open source Quiqr Template.

item.title: New Template Gallery
item.description: We have launched a new template gallery. In this gallery, you will find all Quiqr Community Templates.

item.title: Hugo Conf 2022
item.description: Quiqr went public at the Hugo Conf 2022. We want to thanks the people of the HugoConf for giving us time and space to promote our project.
